subject: Register to win a $10,000 scholarship today!
body:
Win a $10,000 Scholarship on June 30th












 
SCHOLARSHIPS AVAILABLE AT TOP SCHOOLS!

The
$10,000 Grant can be used for any educational opportunity including GED
coursework, Certificate Programs, Undergraduate and Graduate School,
Distance Learning, Home-Based Study, Continuing Education and Career
training. For further information, please CLICK HERE!














 Free Scholarship Guide, Inc. 
  11 Hanover Square, 14th Floor,
  New York, NY 10005 
  To stop receiving these offers please use this link
.
